title: Unforgettable Kakadu Crocodile Hotel Stay with Daily Breakfast & Yellow Water Cruise Upgrade Available
description:
Discover the spirit of Australia at the iconic Mercure Kakadu Crocodile Hotel. This crocodile-shaped property is set in the cosy township of Jabiru within Kakadu National Park - under three hours' drive from Darwin - making it the perfect base to connect with the oldest living culture on earth. Discover the region's incredible history as you marvel at rock art that dates back thousands of years, spot a cunning crocodile and tick off the must-dos, like an Indigenous art class and the ever-popular Yellow Water cruise.

Return to your outback oasis and plunge into the glistening outdoor pool, or feast on some gourmet bush tucker at the Escarpment Restaurant and Bar. Art enthusiasts can admire the hotel's collection of Indigenous art at the onsite gallery or hop over to the nearby Bowali Visitors Centre to deepen your cultural immersion.

offer_address: Flinders Street, Jabiru, Northern Territory 0886, Australia
